ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلذَّٰرِيَٰتِ ذَرْوًۭا
ayahs.translation: By those [winds] scattering [dust] dispersing

ayahs.text: فَٱلْحَٰمِلَٰتِ وِقْرًۭا
ayahs.translation: And those [clouds] carrying a load [of water]

ayahs.text: فَٱلْجَٰرِيَٰتِ يُسْرًۭا
ayahs.translation: And those [ships] sailing with ease

ayahs.text: فَٱلْمُقَسِّمَٰتِ أَمْرًا
ayahs.translation: And those [angels] apportioning [each] matter,

ayahs.text: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَصَادِقٌۭ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, what you are promised is true.

ayahs.text: وَإِنَّ ٱلدِّينَ لَوَٰقِعٌۭ
ayahs.translation: And indeed, the recompense is to occur.

ayahs.text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلْحُبُكِ
ayahs.translation: By the heaven containing pathways,

ayahs.text: إِنَّكُمْ لَفِى قَوْلٍۢ مُّخْتَلِفٍۢ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, you are in differing speech.

ayahs.text: يُؤْفَكُ عَنْهُ مَنْ أُفِكَ
ayahs.translation: Deluded away from the Qur'an is he who is deluded.

ayahs.text: قُتِلَ ٱلْخَرَّٰصُونَ
ayahs.translation: Destroyed are the falsifiers

ayahs.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى غَمْرَةٍۢ سَاهُونَ
ayahs.translation: Who are within a flood [of confusion] and heedless.

ayahs.text: يَسْـَٔلُونَ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
ayahs.translation: They ask, "When is the Day of Recompense?"

ayahs.text: يَوْمَ هُمْ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ يُفْتَنُونَ
ayahs.translation: [It is] the Day they will be tormented over the Fire

ayahs.text: ذُوقُوا۟ فِتْنَتَكُمْ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
ayahs.translation: [And will be told], "Taste your torment. This is that for which you were impatient."

ayahs.text: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّٰتٍۢ وَعُيُونٍ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and springs,

ayahs.text: ءَاخِذِينَ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَبْلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحْسِنِينَ
ayahs.translation: Accepting what their Lord has given them. Indeed, they were before that doers of good.

ayahs.text: كَانُوا۟ قَلِيلًۭا مِّنَ ٱلَّيْلِ مَا يَهْجَعُونَ
ayahs.translation: They used to sleep but little of the night,

ayahs.text: وَبِٱلْأَسْحَارِ هُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ
ayahs.translation: And in the hours before dawn they would ask forgiveness,

ayahs.text: وَفِىٓ أَمْوَٰلِهِمْ حَقٌّۭ لِّلسَّآئِلِ وَٱلْمَحْرُومِ
ayahs.translation: And from their properties was [given] the right of the [needy] petitioner and the deprived.

ayahs.text: وَفِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ءَايَٰتٌۭ لِّلْمُوقِنِينَ
ayahs.translation: And on the earth are signs for the certain [in faith]

ayahs.text: وَفِىٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ ۚ أَفَلَا تُبْصِرُونَ
ayahs.translation: And in yourselves. Then will you not see?

ayahs.text: وَفِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزْقُكُمْ وَمَا تُوعَدُونَ
ayahs.translation: And in the heaven is your provision and whatever you are promised.

ayahs.text: فَوَرَبِّ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقٌّۭ مِّثْلَ مَآ أَنَّكُمْ تَنطِقُونَ
ayahs.translation: Then by the Lord of the heaven and earth, indeed, it is truth - just as [sure as] it is that you are speaking.

ayahs.text: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيْفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ ٱلْمُكْرَمِينَ
ayahs.translation: Has there reached you the story of the honored guests of Abraham? -

ayahs.text: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوا۟ سَلَٰمًۭا ۖ قَالَ سَلَٰمٌۭ قَوْمٌۭ مُّنكَرُونَ
ayahs.translation: When they entered upon him and said, "[We greet you with] peace." He answered, "[And upon you] peace, [you are] a people unknown.

ayahs.text: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ فَجَآءَ بِعِجْلٍۢ سَمِينٍۢ
ayahs.translation: Then he went to his family and came with a fat [roasted] calf

ayahs.text: فَقَرَّبَهُۥٓ إِلَيْهِمْ قَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
ayahs.translation: And placed it near them; he said, "Will you not eat?"

ayahs.text: فَأَوْجَسَ مِنْهُمْ خِيفَةًۭ ۖ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفْ ۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٍۢ
ayahs.translation: And he felt from them apprehension. They said, "Fear not," and gave him good tidings of a learned boy.

ayahs.text: فَأَقْبَلَتِ ٱمْرَأَتُهُۥ فِى صَرَّةٍۢ فَصَكَّتْ وَجْهَهَا وَقَالَتْ عَجُوزٌ عَقِيمٌۭ
ayahs.translation: And his wife approached with a cry [of alarm] and struck her face and said, "[I am] a barren old woman!"

ayahs.text: قَالُوا۟ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْحَكِيمُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
ayahs.translation: They said, "Thus has said your Lord; indeed, He is the Wise, the Knowing."

ayahs.text: ۞ قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
ayahs.translation: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"

ayahs.text: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ أُرْسِلْنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍۢ مُّجْرِمِينَ
ayahs.translation: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals

ayahs.text: لِنُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةًۭ مِّن طِينٍۢ
ayahs.translation: To send down upon them stones of clay,

ayahs.text: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ
ayahs.translation: Marked in the presence of your Lord for the transgressors."

ayahs.text: فَأَخْرَجْنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayahs.translation: So We brought out whoever was in the cities of the believers.

ayahs.text: فَمَا وَجَدْنَا فِيهَا غَيْرَ بَيْتٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
ayahs.translation: And We found not within them other than a [single] house of Muslims.

ayahs.text: وَتَرَكْنَا فِيهَآ ءَايَةًۭ لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ
ayahs.translation: And We left therein a sign for those who fear the painful punishment.

ayahs.text: وَفِى مُوسَىٰٓ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ بِسُلْطَٰنٍۢ مُّبِينٍۢ
ayahs.translation: And in Moses [was a sign], when We sent him to Pharaoh with clear authority.

ayahs.text: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكْنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَٰحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌۭ
ayahs.translation: But he turned away with his supporters and said," A magician or a madman."

ayahs.text: فَأَخَذْنَٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذْنَٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌۭ
ayahs.translation: So We took him and his soldiers and cast them into the sea, and he was blameworthy.

ayahs.text: وَفِى عَادٍ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلرِّيحَ ٱلْعَقِيمَ
ayahs.translation: And in 'Aad [was a sign], when We sent against them the barren wind.

ayahs.text: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَىْءٍ أَتَتْ عَلَيْهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتْهُ كَٱلرَّمِيمِ
ayahs.translation: It left nothing of what it came upon but that it made it like disintegrated ruins.

ayahs.text: وَفِى ثَمُودَ إِذْ قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَمَتَّعُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍۢ
ayahs.translation: And in Thamud, when it was said to them, "Enjoy yourselves for a time."

ayahs.text: فَعَتَوْا۟ عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّٰعِقَةُ وَهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
ayahs.translation: But they were insolent toward the command of their Lord, so the thunderbolt seized them while they were looking on.

ayahs.text: فَمَا ٱسْتَطَٰعُوا۟ مِن قِيَامٍۢ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُنتَصِرِينَ
ayahs.translation: And they were unable to arise, nor could they defend themselves.

ayahs.text: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍۢ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًۭا فَٰسِقِينَ
ayahs.translation: And [We destroyed] the people of Noah before; indeed, they were a people defiantly disobedient.

ayahs.text: وَٱلسَّمَآءَ بَنَيْنَٰهَا بِأَيْي۟دٍۢ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ
ayahs.translation: And the heaven We constructed with strength, and indeed, We are [its] expander.

ayahs.text: وَٱلْأَرْضَ فَرَشْنَٰهَا فَنِعْمَ ٱلْمَٰهِدُونَ
ayahs.translation: And the earth We have spread out, and excellent is the preparer.

ayahs.text: وَمِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقْنَا زَوْجَيْنِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
ayahs.translation: And of all things We created two mates; perhaps you will remember.

ayahs.text: فَفِرُّوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
ayahs.translation: So flee to Allah. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.

ayahs.text: وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
ayahs.translation: And do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.

ayahs.text: كَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَتَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُوا۟ سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
ayahs.translation: Similarly, there came not to those before them any messenger except that they said, "A magician or a madman."

ayahs.text: أَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِهِۦ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌۭ طَاغُونَ
ayahs.translation: Did they suggest it to them? Rather, they [themselves] are a transgressing people.

ayahs.text: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِمَلُومٍۢ
ayahs.translation: So leave them, [O Muhammad], for you are not to be blamed.

ayahs.text: وَذَكِّرْ فَإِنَّ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ تَنفَعُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayahs.translation: And remind, for indeed, the reminder benefits the believers.

ayahs.text: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ ٱلْجِنَّ وَٱلْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ
ayahs.translation: And I did not create the jinn and mankind except to worship Me.

ayahs.text: مَآ أُرِيدُ مِنْهُم مِّن رِّزْقٍۢ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَن يُطْعِمُونِ
ayahs.translation: I do not want from them any provision, nor do I want them to feed Me.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلْقُوَّةِ ٱلْمَتِينُ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, it is Allah who is the [continual] Provider, the firm possessor of strength.

ayahs.text: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ذَنُوبًۭا مِّثْلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصْحَٰبِهِمْ فَلَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونِ
ayahs.translation: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a portion [of punishment] like the portion of their predecessors, so let them not impatiently urge Me.

ayahs.text: فَوَيْلٌۭ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن يَوْمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ
ayahs.translation: And woe to those who have disbelieved from their Day which they are promised.
